duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide leadership and coordinate the design, development, and implementation of programs, services, and processes within the responsible area.
Assure quality, service, satisfaction, continuum, and process improvement, efficient utilization of resources, and financial performance.
Assure productivity standards are met and evaluates the programs, services, and systems.
Facilitate the development and implementation of clinical plans.
Exhibit leadership skills and mentor the clinical staff.

education_certification.credential: Current RN licensure in the State of Ohio; Minimum 2 years clinical Experience, nursing license, and BLS/ACLS Certified.
